verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra He cried בְאָזְנַ֗י <WH241> ve-'a-ze-Nai, also in mine ears ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol voice גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> ga-dOl with a loud לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying קָרְב֖וּ <WH7126> ka-re-Vu to draw near פְּקֻדּ֣וֹת <WH6486> pe-kud-Dot Cause them that have charge הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir; over the city וְאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish even every man כְּלִ֥י <WH3627> ke-Li weapon מַשְׁחֵת֖וֹ <WH4892> mash-che-To [with] his destroying בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> be-ya-Do. in his hand

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh Behold שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> shish-Shah And behold six אֲנָשִׁ֡ים <WH376> 'a-na-Shim and every man בָּאִ֣ים׀ <WH935> ba-'Im came מִדֶּרֶךְ־ <WH1870> mid-de-rech- from the way שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הָעֶלְי֜וֹן <WH5945> ha-'el-Yon of the higher אֲשֶׁ֣ר׀ <WH834> 'a-Sher which מָפְנֶ֣ה <WH6437> ma-fe-Neh which lieth צָפ֗וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah, toward the north וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish man כְּלִ֤י <WH3627> ke-Li weapon מַפָּצוֹ֙ <WH4660> map-pa-Tzo a slaughter בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> be-ya-Do, in his hand וְאִישׁ־ <WH376> ve-'ish- man אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and one בְּתוֹכָם֙ <WH8432> be-to-Cham among לָבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> la-Vush them [was] clothed בַּדִּ֔ים <WH906> bad-Dim, with linen וְקֶ֥סֶת <WH7083> ve-Ke-set inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <WH5608> has-so-Fer with a writer's בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <WH4975> be-ma-te-Nav; by his side וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they went in וַיַּ֣עַמְד֔וּ <WH5975> vai-Ya-'am-Du, and stood אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel beside מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> miz-Bach altar הַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> han-ne-Cho-shet. the brasen

וּכְב֣וֹד׀ <WH3519> u-che-Vod And the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נַעֲלָה֙ <WH5927> na-'a-Lah was gone up מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> me-'Al from הַכְּרוּב֙ <WH3742> hak-ke-Ruv from the cherub אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ha-Yah had been עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, and אֶ֖ל <WH413> 'el to מִפְתַּ֣ן <WH4670> mif-Tan whereupon he was to the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit; of the house וַיִּקְרָ֗א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra, And he called אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ha-'Ish to the man הַלָּבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> hal-la-Vush clothed הַבַּדִּ֔ים <WH906> hab-bad-Dim, with linen אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose קֶ֥סֶת <WH7083> Ke-set inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <WH5608> has-so-Fer which [had] the writer's בְּמָתְנָֽיו׃ <WH4975> be-ma-te-Nav. by his side ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh God; אֵלֹו 'e-lov כאֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about קעֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> 'a-Vor unto him Go through בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch the midst הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, of the city בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> be-Toch through the midst יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem וְהִתְוִ֨יתָ <WH8427> ve-hit-Vi-ta and set תָּ֜ו <WH8420> tav a mark עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over מִצְח֣וֹת <WH4696> mitz-Chot upon the foreheads הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men הַנֶּֽאֱנָחִים֙ <WH584> han-ne-'e-na-Chim that sigh וְהַנֶּ֣אֱנָקִ֔ים <WH602> ve-han-Ne-'e-na-Kim, and that cry עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַתּ֣וֹעֵב֔וֹת <WH8441> hat-To-'e-Vot, for all the abominations הַֽנַּעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> han-na-'a-Sot that be done בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> be-to-Chah. in the midst

וּלְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> u-le-'El-leh And to the others אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar he said בְּאָזְנַ֔י <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nai, in mine hearing עִבְר֥וּ <WH5674> 'iv-Ru Go בָעִ֛יר <WH5892> va-'Ir him through the city אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav ye after וְהַכּ֑וּ <WH5221> ve-hak-Ku; and smite; עַל־ 'al- כאַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and תָּחֹ֥ס <WH408> ta-Chos nay ק; עֵינֵיכֶם 'ei-nei-chem כעֵינְכֶ֖ם <WH5869> 'ein-Chem affliction קוְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תַּחְמֹֽלוּ׃ <WH2550> tach-Mo-lu. neither have ye pity

זָקֵ֡ן <WH2205> za-Ken old בָּח֣וּר <WH970> ba-Chur [and] young וּבְתוּלָה֩ <WH1330> u-ve-tu-Lah both maids וְטַ֨ף <WH2945> ve-Taf and little children וְנָשִׁ֜ים <WH802> ve-na-Shim and women תַּהַרְג֣וּ <WH2026> ta-har-Gu Slay לְמַשְׁחִ֗ית <WH4889> le-mash-Chit, utterly וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish any man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- whom עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and הַתָּו֙ <WH8420> hat-Tav upon whom [is] the mark אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּגַּ֔שׁוּ <WH5066> tig-Ga-shu, but come not near וּמִמִּקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> u-mi-mik-da-Shi at my sanctuary תָּחֵ֑לּוּ <WH2490> ta-Chel-lu; and begin וַיָּחֵ֙לּוּ֙ <WH2490> vai-ya-Chel-lu Then they began בָּאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> ba-'a-na-Shim man הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> haz-ze-ke-Nim, at the ancient אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei which [were] before הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit. the house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to טַמְּא֣וּ <WH2930> tam-me-'U unto them Defile אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit, the house וּמַלְא֧וּ <WH4390> u-mal-'U and fill אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֲצֵר֛וֹת <WH2691> ha-cha-tze-Rot the courts חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> cha-la-Lim with the slain צֵ֑אוּ <WH3318> Tze-'u; go ye forth וְיָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> ve-ya-tze-'U And they went forth וְהִכּ֥וּ <WH5221> ve-hik-Ku and slew בָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> va-'Ir. in the city

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become כְּהַכּוֹתָ֔ם <WH5221> ke-hak-ko-Tam, And it came to pass while they were slaying וְנֵֽאשֲׁאַ֖ר <WH7604> ve-ne-sha-'Ar them and I was left אָ֑נִי <WH589> 'A-ni; I וָאֶפְּלָ֨ה <WH5307> va-'ep-pe-Lah that I fell עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פָּנַ֜י <WH6440> pa-Nai upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֗ק <WH2199> va-'ez-'Ak, and cried וָֽאֹמַר֙ <WH559> va-'o-Mar and said אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> 'a-Hah Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD הֲמַשְׁחִ֣ית <WH7843> ha-mash-Chit wilt thou destroy אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, you אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit all the residue יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בְּשָׁפְכְּךָ֥ <WH8210> be-sha-fe-ke-Cha in thy pouring out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH2534> cha-ma-te-Cha of thy fury עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. Jerusalem

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me עֲוֹ֨ן <WH5771> 'a-Von he unto me The iniquity בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> vi-hu-Dah and Judah גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> ga-dOl great בִּמְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> bim-'Od is very מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> me-'Od, very וַתִּמָּלֵ֤א <WH4390> vat-tim-ma-Le is full הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz and the land דָּמִ֔ים <WH1818> da-Mim, of blood וְהָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ve-ha-'Ir and the city מָלְאָ֣ה <WH4390> mal-'Ah full מֻטֶּ֑ה <WH4297> mut-Teh; of perverseness כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אָמְר֗וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru, for they say עָזַ֤ב <WH5800> 'a-Zav hath forsaken יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the earth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein else יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD רֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> ro-'Eh. seeth

וְגַ֨ם־ <WH1571> ve-Gam- again אֲנִ֔י <WH589> 'a-Ni, I לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no תָח֥וֹס <WH2347> ta-Chos shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <WH5869> 'ei-Ni And as for me also mine eye וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor אֶחְמֹ֑ל <WH2550> 'ech-Mol; neither will I have pity דַּרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> dar-Kam their way בְּרֹאשָׁ֥ם <WH7218> be-ro-Sham upon their head נָתָֽתִּי׃ <WH5414> na-Tat-ti. [but] I will recompense

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold הָאִ֣ישׁ׀ <WH376> ha-'Ish And behold the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <WH3830> le-Vush apparel הַבַּדִּ֗ים <WH906> hab-bad-Dim, with linen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose הַקֶּ֙סֶת֙ <WH7083> hak-Ke-set which [had] the inkhorn בְּמָתְנָ֔יו <WH4975> be-ma-te-Nav, by his side מֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> me-Shiv reported דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> da-Var the matter לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying עָשִׂ֕יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti I have done; כַאֲשֶׁר cha-'a-Sher ככְּכֹ֖ל ke-Chol ק; אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose קצִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <WH6680> tziv-vi-Ta-ni. as thou hast commanded ס sa-Mek
